intervention_catalogue.name: Identity Matters
intervention_catalogue.short_description: Identity Matters (IM) is for men whose offending was motivated or enabled by their affiliation to a particular group. It aims to change the nature of their relationship to the group and helps them develop skills to resist peer influence.
intervention_catalogue.long_description: Identity Matters (IM) is for men whose offending was motivated or enabled by their affiliation to a particular group. It aims to change the nature of their relationship to the group and helps them develop skills to resist peer influence.
intervention_catalogue.session_detail: 23 x one-to-one sessions with a post-programme review.

eligibility_offence.motivation: engagement and/or identification with a group or gang.

possible_outcomes: Ending or reducing an individual’s engagement and/or identification with a gang
Ending or reducing an individual’s readiness to offend on behalf of the gang

risk_consideration.rosh_level:
Medium or high ROSH (Risk of Serious Harm)
50+ OGRS (Offender Group Reconviction Scale)
